subTitle: Ask us anything about our company and services, and get factual responses.

faqs.question: How does BSS pay?
faqs.answer: BSS pays on a weekly basis through direct deposit from Bank to Bank, Zelle, or CashApp.

faqs.question: Does BSS pay gas money?
faqs.answer: Yes, BSS will pay for gas or travel fees for inspections based on the property distance.

faqs.question: After completing work order when will be the payment remitted?
faqs.answer: Our payments are generally remitted within 7 days. For rush work orders or equipment rental issues, payment will be remitted immediately upon communication.

faqs.question: Does BSS pay for rental equipment?
faqs.answer: Yes, BSS will provide the equipment rental cost for work order completion.

faqs.question: Does BSS provide vehicles?
faqs.answer: No, the subcontractor/crew must use their own vehicle.

faqs.question: Does BSS cover insurance?
faqs.answer: Yes, BSS will cover the insurance for the co-workers.

faqs.question: Is the company only work for tenant occupied/rental properties?
faqs.answer: No, BSS works for both types of clients: Property preservation (vacant properties) and Maintenance (tenant occupied/rental properties).
